com.couponproject.exception.CompanyFacadeException

    com.couponproject.facade  

    • Uses of CompanyFacadeException in com.couponproject.facade

      Methods in com.couponproject.facade that throw CompanyFacadeException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Creates new Coupon in the DB based on a given Coupon instance The Coupon is added to the coupon table and the company_coupon table
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getAllCoupons()
      Returns a collection of all the Coupons of this Company
      Coupon CompanyFacade.getCoupon(long id)
      Returns Coupon instance based on a given Coupon's ID
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByEndDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Returns a collection of all the Coupons of this Company that have a End date before a specific date
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByPrice(double price)
      Returns a collection of all the Coupons of this Company up to a specified price
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByStartDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Returns a collection of all the Coupons of this Company that have a Start date after a specific date
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCouponByType(CouponType type)
      Returns a collection of all the Coupons of this Company with a specific CouponType
      static CompanyFacade CompanyFacade.login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Returns CompanyFacade instance upon a successful login and null if login fails
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Removes an existing Coupon from the DB based on a given Coupon instance.
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Updates an existing Coupon in the DB based on a given Coupon instance
      Constructors in com.couponproject.facade that throw CompanyFacadeException 
      Constructor and Description
